## openapi-error-code-gen

Convert from following yaml

```yaml
ErrorCode:
      description: エラーコード
      type: integer
      enum:
      - 100
      - 200
      - 304
      x-enum-varnames:
      # valid patterns
        # 1. http error
        # 2. http error, error name
        # 3. http error, error name, error message
      - InternalServerError,Unknown
      - BadRequest
      - NotFound
```

to 

```go
// Code generated by openapi-error-code-gen DO NOT EDIT.
package apierrors

import (
	"net/http"
)

var (
	ErrUnknown             = New(http.StatusInternalServerError, 100, "unknown")
	ErrBadRequest          = New(http.StatusBadRequest, 200, "bad request")
	ErrNotFound            = New(http.StatusNotFound, 300, "not found")
)

```
